name: Alpha Kids Academy
description: Children will be introduced to the world of reading as well as daily activities like coloring, singing, sports, and science. Learning the foundational skills they can rely upon for their academic future. When children attend AKASF preschool, childcare, or daycare, they don't just learn, but they have fun while doing it.
